mapper.sql: family_id, family_name, family_phone, family_address, family_ordid, family_relation, family_addname, family_addtime, family_registrant, family_rtime, family_note
f.family_id, f.family_name, f.family_phone, f.family_address, f.family_ordid, f.family_relation, f.family_addname, f.family_addtime, f.family_registrant, f.family_rtime, f.family_note, f.timeliness
mapper.update: update jd_family set family_name = #{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_phone = #{familyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_address = #{familyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_relation = #{familyRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_registrant = #{familyRegistrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, family_rtime = #{familyRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, family_note = #{familyNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where family_id = #{familyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select , , ,
from jd_family f inner join service_nurse sn on f.family_registrant = sn.id inner join sys_user su on f.family_addname = su.id inner join jd_oldpeople o on f.family_ordid = o.oldpeople_id where f.timeliness = 0 order by f.family_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into jd_family (family_name, family_phone, family_address, family_ordid, family_relation, family_addname, family_addtime, family_registrant, family_rtime, family_note) values (#{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyOrdid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{familyRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyAddname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{familyAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{familyRegistrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{familyRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{familyNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
